author: Souheil Inati, Michael Hansen, et al.

debug.description: Debug XML flag. The debug flag outputs the following additional files: xml_raw.xml, processed.xml, config_buffer.xprot

measNum.description: Measurement number. Value used in the case of input VD file that contains multiple measurements.

pMap.description: Parameter map XML from list of embedded files. Options are the following: IsmrmrdParameterMap_Siemens.xml (default for VD Scan), IsmrmrdParameterMap_Siemens_VB17.xml (default for VB Scan), IsmrmrdParameterMap.xml

pMapStyle.description: Parameter stylesheet XSL from list of embedded files. Options are the following: IsmrmrdParameterMap_Siemens.xsl (default), IsmrmrdParameterMap_Siemens_EPI.xsl, IsmrmrdParameterMap_Siemens_EPI_FLASHREF.xsl, IsmrmrdParameterMap.xsl

description: The Siemens to ISMRM-RD Convertor is used to convert data from Siemens raw data format (.dat) into ISMRM-RD raw data format (.h5).

dat.description: Input is a Siemens dat file. Dat file can be a VB file or a VD file. In case of VD file that contains multiple measurements, the user can specify which measurement to convert by using the config option 'measNum'.

user_map.description: Parameter map XML file from user

user_stylesheet.description: Parameter stylesheet XSL file from user

label: Siemens to ISMRM-RD Converter
name: siemens_to_ismrmrd
